info.author: Daniel Thornton
info.description: Changeling is about doing what you want it to. You need only set it up right. It could be a blog, a project management system suited precisely to your needs, a wiki, your own personal online office suite. All of the public pages are dynamically defined in every way possible, so that you can tweak them to do exactly what you want they way you want. All of the content is stored in a database that is structured exactly how you define it. Changeling does your way.
